text:
Each three months, the Chief of Police and the Director of Parking and Traffic shall forward to the Board of Supervisors a report containing the amount paid pursuant to the provisions of this Chapter, to whom paid and the justification therefor. 
(Added by Ord. 68-76, App. 3/12/76; amended by Ord. 56-92, App. 2/20/92)
CHAPTER 10D:

heading.title: 10C
heading.catch_text: REPORTS BY THE CHIEF OF POLICE AND DIRECTOR OF THE DEPARTMENT OF PARKING AND TRAFFIC.
